description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Bananas with Tapioca recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Coconut Bananas with Tapioca Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup reduced-fat milk (standard milk can be used)
1 cup light coconut milk (standard coconut milk can be used)
0.25 cup grated palm sugar (or brown sugar)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tapioca and milk in a saucepan. Cover and stand for 2 hours. Place saucepan over a medium heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until tapioca is translucent. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Remove from heat.
Melt the butter in a frying pan over medium heat. When butter is sizzling, add sugar and stir for 1-2 minutes or until dissolved.
Add bananas and cook for 2 minutes or until light golden and tender. Turn and cook for a further minute. Stir in coconut milk until well combined.
Spoon tapioca into bowls, top with bananas and sauce. Serve with toasted coconut.
